original_text: Since our ancestors were alive, we have continued to do wrong things. Because of our sins, you have given our enemies power over us, our kings and our priests. Foreign kings and their armies have killed some of our people. They have made some of us prisoners. They have robbed us and they have caused us to be ashamed. And we are still ashamed today.
korean_text: 우리 조상들의 때로부터 오늘까지 우리의 죄가 심하매 우리의 죄악으로 말미암아 우리와 우리 왕들과 우리 제사장들을 여러 나라 왕들의 손에 넘기사 칼에 죽으며 사로잡히며 노략을 당하며 얼굴을 부끄럽게 하심이 오늘날과 같으니이다

sentences.original_text: we have continued to do wrong things.
you have given our enemies power over us,
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 우리의 원수에게 우리를 다스릴 권세를 주셨고,

sentences.original_text: have killed some of our people.
They have made some of us prisoners.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 우리 중 일부를 포로로 만들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and they have caused us to be ashamed.
And we are still ashamed today.
